case.state: Hell of a greeting. Mari, right? You've done your homework!
Holy shit, a giant talking Raccoon!
So... this is what we're playing at the campfire, then? Are we sure this isn't a trial?
Time for some well-needed R+R.
A pleasure.
A perfect way to get some time away from the "office."
I wasn't expecting this to turn into a trial... But good to see you, ~name~.
Nice to see you, ~name~. Is this going to be a trial, or something more... uh... like the earlier parts of a horror movie?
I see the conventional way of hooking survivors wasn't enough, was it, ~name~?
Fuck. Is this some new twisted game for you, ~name~?
...Usually, when it comes to a zombie like ~name~, there's more of a gunfight than a card game. Not sure how I feel about this.
Well. As long as ~name~ isn't going to start trying to bite anyone or mutate into something way less cute, I guess we can just focus on the game...?
Whoa... uh... can't say I haven't been in a compromising position near a BOW, but this is a bit much.
Uh... "Zoe," right? You're... you've got that whole thing under control over there, right?
You don't think you need to be worried about me impressing everyone else, too, Tao? Well... let's make it a date.
Mommy? You're going to have to try a little harder. Winters would go nuts if he heard you use that name.
Ahahaha--! You're serious? Well all right then, Mommy.
Well. If I'm going to call you Mama, you gotta show me I've been a good boy, don't you think?
Hey, you're one hot mama either way, Mommy.
I thought it was just the jetski ride and the explosions, but you were completely serious, weren't you, Ash?
When you brought up the overtime thing, you weren't kidding.
I've known a few Ashleys. Kind of like the president's daughter type more than the boomstick and mettle of man type.
Ashley's either a name for a politician's daughter or a dandy. I guess it's dandy to have you here, Ash.
Everything's beautiful tonight, Tao. Including you.
Everything's beautiful tonight, Tao. Including you.
The dress is beautiful, Tao. I'm glad I get to see you like this, no matter where we are.
Exotic women with a talent for combat in red dresses might be a weakness of mine, but isn't this a little much?
You can play with me as much as you like, Tao. As long as I'm with you, I'm in for a great game.
Me? No way, Trixie.
Whoa, lady, that's not a costume, is it? This'll be interesting.
...Looking to be a different kind of sandwich, Jill?
Jill, I never took you for a sandwich-liker.
Claire's great, Chris, but we're just friends.
Bro, if you want to continue the bloodline so bad, why don't you get a girlfriend?
Okay, Daddy it is. I'm more into the acid rock stuff than beatniks, but whatever floats your boat.
I'm more of a grunge enjoyer, but okay, Daddy-o.
Well. Claire, gotta say, you could've just asked me out. I just never wanted to assume you were actually interested.
Oh uh... Claire. I thought it was a joke this whole time... I guess not.
Look, man. I deal with megalomaniacs professionally. Let's play, but I'm not calling you that.
No way, man. Enough with the psycho domineering shit. We can play, but I'll call you something else.
Good to see you, Cheryl. Or is it Heather, today? Biohazards and curses aren't going to stop us tonight. ...Right?
Good to see you, Heather. Or is it Cheryl today? Biohazards and curses aren't going to stop us tonight. ...Right?
Ada? O-oh. My mistake. Just thought you looked like... someone I know.
Ada? Oh... Uh... must be a common name.
...Guess Ada Wong's a pretty common name. Or a pretty fake one...
...I'm fine being outnumbered by Bioweapons, but this is rich.
My one night off, and I'm still fighting zombies and worse. Fine.
I don't mind being a bodyguard, but you know I came here to play, right? Uh...
Hm. It's not like Ashley wasn't cute, but the boss's daughter, after a mission to save her? Not cool, bro.
Sigh. High school Leon'd be jealous right now, Didn't sign up to be a babysitter. Tonight, anyway.
You travel as much as I do, and a game of cards is a bit like stepping back home. Name's Leon.
This is a mission I think I'm going to like. I'm Leon Kennedy. Agent.
Finally. Glad it's something straightforward. I'm Leon. Good to play with you.
~Cards.text~ for me, please.
~Cards.text~. Not my favorite part of the game.
It's going to be like this, huh?
Dealer, I'll swap ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~, dealer.
Huh.
It's a start. ~Cards.text~.
Not bad. ~Cards.text~.
~Cards.text~.
Nice to hit an ammo dump, even if it'll get harder from here.
There we go.
I'm a regular master of poker.
No way, man.
Hey, looks like I got lucky, and I'm just getting started.
I'd offer to pass this hand to you, but I'm used to keeping my own inventory. And this is good stuff.
Nice. It's not always what you find, but how you can put it together.
Still in it.
Damn. Well, always carry a backup weapon. You'd be surprised how quickly a situation can turn... rough.
Okay. Not really much of a tactical play that can be made here, but I'm not doomed, yet.
I don't have much of a poker face, but I'm pretty good at one-liners.
Everyone doing alright?
I think the stakes here are just right.
Not too bad. The view or the cards.
Okay. Let's get to it.
Not a lot left in the clip. In terms of cards in the deck.
I'm a never-say-die kind of man. Both because optimism is important and because few things ever really stay down when I'm involved.
A challenge just makes winning better. I'm just lucky like that, I guess.
Well, come on, then. Take a look.
Damn.
Ah, damn. Bad news for me. But, I'm more an action guy than a sit and read one.
Getting dealt bad hands is just a way of life for me. Why worry?
I can't say I trust you just yet... but... look, if you're here to have a good time... I need a bit to get used to this, that's all.
Uh... you know, I'm not exactly showing up with my attache stocked to the nines... I hope you both brought your own set of explosives, too.
(What is Tao talking about...? Women...)
O-Oh... Well then...
...I'm not the kind of guy to get greedy... but it depends a little bit on both you and Tao... I'm certainly not against it, though.
Hang in there, Tao.
Save some for me, Tao. Or at least some for later, huh?
Almost...
Okay... did I get the worst hand or not...? C'mon seven high.
(Do I need to wear a...? In most cases, I should, but... she seems open to it. But is she crazy...? Hm...)
(Are we going to have sex in front of everyone else...? Kind of kills the romance...)
(Is she going to want to keep seeing me after this?)
I'd definitely be winning if losing didn't sound so damn good, you know.
(Yes, yes, yes.)
I'm... really flattered, Tao. I do feel like we have a lot in common and you are my type... I do want to do more than just play this game...
Well... Jeez. You are my type, and we have a lot in common... I can't say this isn't helping things...
I get the feeling you're on to something here, Tao. And you caught me staring, so it's only fair that you ask me to help you out, right?
You caught me, Tao. And... you're really on to something, I think.
Well... I'm flattered, Tao, but if you like this, I certainly find it... amazing.
I... I've never been asked a question like this. But, you can keep doing whatever you're doing. I'm sure you'll look amazing no matter what.
So... how'd that work? Does your world even have guns? I just have a magic crystal, then what? You mix it with fire, and... there go the bad guys?
That's... I guess seeing is believing. No guns in Teyvat, right? I guess that leaves me with knives... At least I'd be back to back with you. Not a bad place to be.
If it's a competition you want, a magic crystal seems like a pretty good prize. I don't usually like jewelry... but for you, I'd wear it with pride.
H-hey, I'm not that great, you know.
It's strange to see you flustered, but... have to say. I like the outfit you're wearing, Tao. Mind if you wore it a bit more often? Maybe to celebrate something?
H-Hey... not that I mind, but at least get me behind closed doors, Tao...
Strange... Don't you have have a poem about strangeness requiring a strange shape to fit? Then I'll be as weird as you like, Tao.
Perfect for my mouth and other things, Tao. But you need to wait to take those off before I can take care of you, can't I?
I prefer to take the lead, but... isn't it a bit early to assume I'm all yours? I guess you might know better than me, though. And besides, not a bad deal in my book.
A lady who's skilled with weapons can wear what she likes. But those gloves made you look like a movie star, Ms. Hu.
Ms. Hu, those gloves made you look more like a movie star than a funeral director. But you'd make anything look stylish.
...Well, of course I'd... there's no hurry, right? Plenty of time to eat... then... what kind of special treatment? I'd still go down on you. But what kind of special treatment?
That Vision? Like that red crystal you have? Does it let you control your ghost, or just control fire? It seems a little unreal to me, but I've seen a few things in my time that aren't really...
I couldn't ask you to do that. I'm more of a flesh and gunpowder kind of guy. Sorcery and science are pretty much the same to me.
No wine? No beer? You're missing out, lady. Pizza's... it's like bread, but covered in cheese with meat, vegetables, and tomato sauce. Kind of a date mainstay.
Fischl, I heard that right, didn't I? You want me to fuck you? And you even said "please"?
I think it's something nice and hard, and it would fit right there between your legs.
Well, since you insisted I look... Mind leaning forward and giving me a nice long look? Or do I have to keep kicking your ass at cards?
Well, since you insisted I look... Mind leaning forward and giving me a nice long look? Or do I have to start spanking you at cards?
All I can say about those "classified" ladies is much like you just did, I'm stuck imagining them naked rather than any... night operations.
Never had the chance to share someone, Hilda. I'm a guy that likes competition. But I'm sure I can make you happily sore by morning alone, too.
...I'm too suckered in not to fall for this at this point. Let's just make this mission quick and the R+R afterwards long, all right, Tao?
Jeez, lady. I'm a sucker for a girl in a red dress. What do you want me to say?
Oh... Y-yeah, the ghosts. That's what's bugging me. Not... how cute you look in that outfit. Right. Yeah. Totally.
Good to know, while you're giving out tips for what to think about... how'd a guy like me go about asking you on a date? Any ideas on that?
N-No... I... you're really pretty. And... if a guy's got a type, you're it to the last piece, Tao... I'm just... flustered.
If Liyue's got traditions that make you the way you are, I can't say I've got a problem with it. The only problem I have is that... well... that I haven't met you before this.
I don't exactly see you doing a twirl... but if you wouldn't mind giving me a close look later, we'll call it even, Ms. Hu.
I like that you're neatly trimmed like that. Your hair's so bright... uh, in the upstairs, that to see it a little darker below seems... naughty and thematic, right?
I think I could add something. Maybe let's talk about that in a hand or two, Kumatora, if you're interested?
You're all right with a little flirting, right? Having meaningless fun's perfectly fine, but I wouldn't mind having a... classified case, Hilda.
You're... a zombie? But... how? You're so... well, normal's the wrong word but...
That's usually my favorite kind of date. We can mix in some zombie-slaying if that gets you going... And I do mean it, by the way.
Just so you know, a man's nipples and chest are less sensitive. But I think we tend to enjoy touching a woman's breasts a lot more. They're just... nice.
(Should we tell her we can see her panties...? Nah... probably better to let her own this.)
...I'd really like that, Tao.
Who? Me? Well... thanks, Miku. Who doesn't love a compliment?
Can't say that I do, Tao. They'd sure come in handy.
...I'm hoping that's a good thing. Weird, possibly creepy. But ultimately good. And not bad.
Damn, Kumatora. You say you're inexperienced, but you've got the perfect idea on what to do.
N-no, it's a compliment! Like... a performer. Someone who's famous for her talents and elegance... not... at all a bad thing...
It's sort of like that, but it's recorded. You see the pictures moving, with music, and dialogue, but the people aren't there. It's a lot of fun, Tao. Especially to get to know someone.
The monsters and all that... that I can understand. But your hat's part of your uniform, right?
Your hair's... Well, it's really pretty, Tao. But that hat's more than just a fashion statement, right?
I try my best, Estelle.
Hell of a question, Sakura. You're cute, but... usually the sorts of things I do to zombies aren't the kinds of things I'd want to do to you.
Damn, Tao...
I liked the view from the front, but... holy shit, lady!
Blake Belladonna... That's your real name, right? It kind of matches with the whole gothy theme. I know William Blake's one of my favorite poets.
Hate to ruin the attitude of the game, but there's a cute girl over there who's either tricking me or I'm the luckiest guy alive. Let me get to losing.
Hey, ~player~, she's waiting for me over there. So... let me get right to this, all right?
So, what kind of influences do you use in your music?
What's your background? Not that I'm trying to profile you, but I actually was... kind of a hooligan right until senior year. Guess you didn't grow out of it.
What kind of movies do you like, Saki? I feel like... you'd be into horror.
That Dread of yours, you mentioned it's for... space combat?
Flying a spaceship, hell, a mech at that, seems awesome. It seems whenever I'm behind the wheel of something in combat, it crashes.
I think the idea of an average man or average woman kind of makes it hard to have a sample size. What distinguishes you? I guess you want to know about my hobbies...?
I like to read books when I'm not cleaning up bioterrorism messes. What are your hobbies?
Huh. So, men really are from Mars and women are from Venus, where you're from? I can't imagine going my whole life, then suddenly finding out there's another sex out there.
As far as how I treat women... well, just about as well as they treat me. Better, in most cases. I'm not at war with women, if that's what you're asking. How do you treat men?
So a penis is a "tube"... Men on Earth tend to call a vagina a "pussy". Any other profanity you wouldn't mind being used to describe you?
Drinks and beyond, huh? Well... You seem like you're capable. Hope you don't mind my lack of ears, but that seems like fun.
(There's no way this chick isn't a pirate.)
(Huh... is she a pirate? No exotic dancer would take the role so seriously...)
Let's get you out of those shorts, and then let's talk. I want to see if you really fire up when your life-- or your modesty is on the line.
Well... there's a little time left before we get too tired, so why not? Let's make the world a little better, all right?
Yeah. I feel like it would be nice to be with you on a mission... or just in a nice, rural town, talking.
W-well... what do you mean by that? Me blindfolded... fondling the others...?
You know, you talk a big game. I'd better make sure I can get as deep as you need me to, Tao.
If I can make you scream my name, I'll consider it a success.
H-Hey... I get to have some time to get used to this, don't I? ...Don't I?
Your world's a little more wondrous than mine. Just a place. One that's gone but...
Tao... I... We're from different worlds but... I mean, obviously I'd like to see this through.
...Less hard of a question than you'd think. Teyvat seems... a little more put together, honestly.
Hey, I'd rather be in your world, and figure out how to get one of those things, than leave you defenseless. Not that complicated, right?
Oh... come on. How many undead hunting Leons could you know?
That's nice and all... but what does that mean for me? If you go off with someone... am I supposed to just be okay with that?
Well, you're cute and you seem to like me... but if you'd rather it not be filmed, that'd be fine too.
...You're the one that's been ogling me, you know. If you want to be a cop, you gotta look past appearances and find the heart of the matter.
Actually, yeah. Being a bit rough around the edges, but caring a lot? Makes a great cop. Would love to see what you can do in a few years on the force.
...Hey, no matter what happens or has happened, you're not whatever prompted that, right? You're fine, just like you are. Keep moving forward, okay?
If you've got the skills for it. Don't think you'd be a great guard, but you're smart enough to make detective. Lots of jobs like that. Not all of them fieldwork.
I can tell. But let's just say I'm not giving you any referrals, given where we met, Natsuki.
If you're lucky and don't constantly stick your neck out, you probably won't end up like me. Can't recommend it, besides.
Not a betting man, usually, but I guess you can take pretty good care of yourself. If that's what you're looking for tonight... well, I'm not here to hop in the bath, am I?
You might have to keep at it for a while, and stay clear of the blast radius if you don't want it on your face, Kumatora...
Well, Kumatora, I'd be happy to give you a chance to test it out... just be careful. It can make a mess and I'd hate to give you more of a taste than you're looking for.
Laying on my back and watching you figure things out is probably the best exception to wanting to figure out how to lead.
Tao... Well, it's not what I'm used to hearing. But that just makes me all... well. You're capable, and beautiful, and fun, so why wouldn't I?
I'd love to take you out, Tao. Any plans you want?
Whatever kind of date you want, Tao. You've more than earned it. Beers, pizza, zoo, movies... anything you want.
I'm not always the biggest fan of the gothics. I see enough in my line of work, I guess you could say. Castles, zombies. All that.
Blake, on William Blake, heh. A lot about the ephemeral nature of life. The commonalities between man and nature.
So, those "Death Poems," you mentioned? Happen to have a copy in that book of yours? They sound... well. I could always use some exotic poetry.
I'm usually prepared. I hope you don't mind me improvising a bit, too.
Nice day to be at the beach. And at a bar. Feels a lot better now that I've taken off my jacket.
Without my jacket, it's nice to enjoy the beach. Could really use a bar, or some tiki drinks, though.
...Look, if this is some kind of trap, for all the stuff I hate about it, the government's not going to fall for it.
Not thrilled to be back in school. I miss the academy, but this isn't really where I want to undress. I just figured I'd have won by now.
Cozy in here. We all gonna snuggle up, ~player~?
Can't say I'm used to Paris looking so nice. Don't think I'll get used to it, but a great place to play a game like this and get romantic.
...Sort of steamy in here. And not for the reasons I really expected.
Wonder if they have any Westerns on the shelves here... or are they blank...? Or just porn...?
Can't say I've ever visited actual hotsprings. Kind of nice, once you get the leather jacket off.
Kind of filthy back here. Guess if we're going to do filthy things, may as well go all the way?
So... This Inventory place isn't really on Earth... right? That's fine. I could use a break from all the government-sanctioned monster hunting.
There's lots of weird stuff in your worlds, right? The Inventory isn't on Earth, is it? Or... not mine, anyway. I work for an Earth government.
I specialize in dealing with terrorist threats, particularly those employing bio-organic weapons. If it sounds like a bad dream, trust me, reality is worse. Zombies, mutants, that sort of thing.
Have any of you heard the term "BOW"? You will if you keep me talking, but it means "bio-organic weapon." They're monsters made by infecting humans, mostly.
People and bioweapons carry the weirdest things.
You know, lots of rookies are always popping their clips out to reload after a shot or two. They do realize they have to reload the clip too, right?
I've gotten pretty good at cooking eggs. Spent a lot of time eating them in Eastern Europe.
Hm. This isn't a setup, is it? ...I wonder if it's better to just ask someone to get naked, or if a game makes it a bit easier?
(I wonder if Ada's ever played something like this...)
Are there any house rules here? I'm pretty good at figuring out a situation on the fly if I know what I'm working with. Or if I don't.
I'm glad it's really just poker. Reading scribbled notes on mad science and cultic gibberish gets old and cryptic after a while.
A single pair is pretty much the most common thing you can expect, right? ...Well, I suppose you'll see pairs of lots of things in a game like this.
Call me old-fashioned, but I enjoy a good typewriter over an email or GSM where I can find one. Less risk of a signal being hijacked by some psycho.
Kind of a mixed bag tonight. Anyone here happen to know if they sell ink ribbons here? I guess the price of obscure interests is more than just money.
Apparently there's this movie about another guy named Leon. Everyone always asks me if I'm being professional. And I'm nothing but, you know?
I've heard and said a few bad pickup lines in my time. But "Hey girl, are you a zombie? Because I want you to bite me" is probably the worst.
It takes all types, right? Some of us use our brains, some of us just punch boulders.
Why do people always overcomplicate things? You should be able to press a button to open a door, like a reasonable person. Not backtrack to the basement for a cat statue or whatever.
Drawing things out with lots of accessories or taking off something big in two parts isn't a bad idea. Instant gratification is overrated. Maybe I'm just a masochist.
The best asset's the mind. A sharp one can be all you need to make it through the night.
I could really use a back massage. I usually carry around a lot of gear, even if it's pretty well organized.
If you focus and think for a second, it can save a round of ammo or even your life. Most people'd rather die than think, I guess.
It's pretty lucky that most guns use similar types of ammo. It would be a shame to get deep cover only to find your weapons are useless.
I've gotten a lot of use out of that toxicology class I took at the academy. Herbs that give you a bit of pep might wear off in a day or two, but damned if that isn't life or death.
I wonder if there's some kind of knife that has a gun with it? Not like a bayonet, but something you can use to fire off a round in the squall of melee...
Anyone a wrestler? I've got a pretty mean suplex and powerbomb. Even taught the president's daughter.
You know, I've seen a lot of zombies drool a bit when they get close to humans. But first time I think one's dripping elsewhere for my cock, Sakura.
Hey, wait a second, you two. Be nice--
H-Hey-- I-- Tao's offer was good... but it's not a competition, you know...
...What's going on over there?
Ladies, is there a conversation you want to bring me in on?
'Ravi, I'm not the kind of guy to lead a girl on. I'm having a lot of fun playing with you. I get the sense that someone else here is going to be... a little territorial.
I don't. But... it doesn't rule out meeting someone here, of all places.
What the fuck are you two talking about? Ahahah!
Well, this is all pretty harmless... so... yeah, go ahead, Natsuki.
Uh, hey, ~player~. Any advice for what to do here? Not used to being in the middle of something like this... Kind of surreal...
The fact you're treating me like a piece of meat isn't exactly appealing, you know.
~Player~, what's a guy to do in a situation like this? It's... flattering but sort of strange. You're not feeling left out, are you?
Only if I can buy you one back. What's your poison? I'll take a beer.
A beer sounds perfect. But it's only fair if I get you one back. What can I get for you?
...Something on your mind, Rosa?
Lady, I usually have a couple things to apologize for.
Sounds like you're serious about that date, Rosa.
The spooky shit works a lot better on someone who doesn't actually deal with those sorts of things, Hu Tao.
Hu Tao, that's creepy, but it's a better line on macho types who've never seen a corpse lunge around a corner at them.
You're cute so I can put up with another minute or two of this, but ghosts aren't real. BOW's are.
BOWs exist. Ghosts don't. You're really doubling down on this schtick, but that's a bad bet for the game.
I was wrong, I guess. Ghosts are real, just not in my world. I deal with... I guess you'd call them mutants, or undead, but they're not alive how you or I would think of them. Those are BOWs.
Nope. Ghosts are still new to me. Most of the things I have to fight were alive at one point, then got mutated into something worse. We call them BOWs.
I find shooting them in the head or lighting them on fire does a lot. Or you can blow them up.
I don't mean to make it sound easy, but a heavy blow to the head, incineration... freezing them, blowing them up... lots of options.
That's about right. I was there during the first big outbreak, in Raccoon City. First day on the force. Only one that made it out.
I was there in Raccoon City, just a day late enough to avoid getting caught when the first BOWs really came out in force. First day on the job, and last.
Besides the evolving ways in which people are trying to kill or control each other, it's nice.
It's generally a nice place, but people are always finding new ways to kill each other.
I could use some help, but... I'm not sure I need it with the undead at this point, Tao...
Tao, at this stage, I could use a bit of other support.
Hey, one of us has to be equipped to handle problems. If you want to find me in a difficult position, save it for when the game's wrapped up...
You're making that a really difficult proposition. If we had to deal with a BOW, you'd be able to take care of that first, right?
N-not often.
Y-you're... uh... quite a bit prettier, Tao...
Not all of us having flaming butterflies on command. I've got to use bullets, and those run out. And I can't get too tired.
I wish it were that easy. I've got to keep my attention together, not get too hurt, and not run out of shells, Tao.
You don't strike me as the blushing kind, Tao.
I have the stuttering effect on a few types of people. You didn't strike me as one of them, Tao.
You can always help out later. Tao... but I prefer to be the one making the first moves.
I don't mind some teamwork, but wouldn't be much of a gentleman if I made you do all the work.
For a woman like you? I'm not so sure I could even if I wanted.
When the woman's like you? Can't say I find any issue with it.
Happy to, Tao. Anything else you want?
Say the word, and I can do even more than that, Tao.
Give a guy a break, Tao. You being cute about kicking my ass doesn't make it that much better.
I know, I know, sloppy technique, Tao. You're kicking my ass at cards.
What, Tao? I--
I... I'm sorry, Tao, what?
I hate to disappoint...
As much as I'd love to show off for you...
Sorry, I don't think I could I could hear you.
I've heard of biting the bullet... but you're being a bit quiet, Tao. What was that?
Well, I wouldn't mind.
If you're teasing, it's still just as good to me.
Hey, you've got a good eye, Ignatz.
Quick study, Ignatz.
A little... I've used a crossbow once or twice.
I've had to use a crossbow on an occasion or two.
Sure, Ignatz. Any tips on how I should hold it? Or hit my target?
Well, gotta help people somehow. It'd be nice to be out of a job, given what I have to do professionally.
I've got the sort of job you wish nobody had to have.
Everything's a nail to a guy with a hammer. If it keeps being a problem, at least there'll be more people like me to take care of them.
Not much of a glass half full-type, Meia. I worry about it. But there's more to life than work. And I'm not the only one out there stopping them.
Appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm an expert at hanging in there.
Tao, aren't you the mistress of endings? If anyone here's excited, it's you.
Heh. Tao, don't you know that presuming isn't always the right play?
I don't mind that you're being more forward. But I'm not sure I need an expert...
You know, normally a guy's gotta work to get a girl to yell his name...
...You're just here to have a good time like everyone else, right? That's gotta be... kind of a lot, Zoe.
If it helps, you're a lot more put together than the types of things I fight.
No Zoe yet, though. Want to change that?
Well, I'm glad we agree I'm a hero. But maybe I'm not as mortal as you think...
Heh. Who are you calling mortal? Can you tell? But I'm glad we agree I'm a hero.
If you're getting flustered over this, you're welcome to show me your chest, Fischl. I think it'd be more interesting than mine.
Well, if you want me to do that thing you wanted me to do to you later, Fischl... You'd probably start to getting used to this view.
What makes you think that? My good looks? I'm a real agent, Rosa.
If the price of dealing with some zombies means walking the walk a bit better... well, not a complete loss.
